```{python}
#| echo: false
import yaml

# Load cards.yml
with open("cards.yml", "r") as f:
    cards = yaml.safe_load(f)

# Start the cards container
cards_html = '<div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 1.5rem;">'

for card in cards:
    card_html = f'''
    <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; padding: 1rem; border: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 2px 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);">
      <div style="flex: 0 0 25%; text-align: center; padding: 0.5rem;">
        <img src="{card['image']}" alt="Image" style="width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px;">
      </div>
      <div style="flex: 1; padding: 0.5rem;">
        <h3 style="margin-top: 0;">{card['title']}</h3>
        <p>{card['description']}</p>
        <div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 1rem; margin-top: 1rem;">
    '''

    # Add tags, skip graduation-cap
    for tag in card['tags']:
            card_html += f'''
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; font-weight: bold; font-size: 0.9rem; color: #1f2937;">
              <i class="bi bi-{tag['icon']}" style="margin-right: 0.3rem;"></i> {tag['text']}
            </div>
            '''
    card_html += '</div></div></div>'

    cards_html += card_html

cards_html += '</div>'

from IPython.display import display, HTML
display(HTML(cards_html))
```
